tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: HOT GIRLS of WAVERLY PLACE!
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: THANKS FOR SUBSCRIBING! New Videos EVERY SATURDAY! Click here for more! www.youtube.com want me to FOLLOW U? all u have to do is click this and share my new vid with ur friends and ill follow as many of u as i can!! whoo! clicktotweet.com SUBSCRIBE TO SHANNA! www.youtube.com THANKS FOR SUBSCRIBING! :) I have 3 channels! Check em out! :) *Main Channel* www.youtube.com *2nd Channel* (vlogs & extras) www.youtube.com *iPhone Channel* (daily vlogs) www.youtube.com Check out Wilmer's show "King Of The Floor" here: www.youtube.com Hit me up on my social networks! Google+ plus.google.com Facebook www.facebook.com Twitter www.twitter.com Website www.shanedawsontv.com Tumblr http Shirts & Merch www.shanedawson.spreadshirt.com Send letters to 3727 W. Magnolia Blvd #712 Burbank, CA 91505 *Branding, Media, & General Business Inquiries: The Collective ShaneDawsonTVBiz@gmail.com *Film & Television Agent: William Morris Endeavor (310) 285-9000

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Lmfao does he know your are﻿ sane?
"You﻿ probably also google this often." "What's this rash thats on my legs?"
this chick at school called taylah﻿ hoskins recons your her cousin
not jenna marbles...﻿
OMG..﻿ hahaha

Ha! You thought this would insult me! FAIL! I am a true fan, and OK I am an "ass-kisser" to Shane. So? I don't give a fuck. I've been watching his videos for.. 2 years maybe? idk, i' not weird I don't keep track. I'm not "on his dick" because i've never met him, and never been on his dick so... I don't know what you mean by that. a true fan is supportive towards Shane, no negative comments, likes all of his videos, and would do anything for Shane. He is NOT going to be forgotten﻿ by me, EVER. F U
You are such﻿ a good interviewer!! loved this!!
Stevie wonder ﻿
Why r there no﻿ other comments on here??
thumb up if you want shane to make a new﻿ interactive game/video,,,
what﻿ happand shane???? u goimg down
Jenna Marbles. Or justin bieber (:﻿
Get﻿ Justin beiber
What are you talking about?﻿
Get﻿ Jenna Marbles on the show!
lol at the end of the video﻿ shanaynay's eyebrow was dripping
This guy is a fukin poof,tranny ﻿ fuckin boring video ;'l
Shane you took it kinda far at 3:25 man﻿ :/
Get Barbara Streisand﻿ on the show
Jenna Marbles can suck a fat dick. I hate that annoying bitch lol ﻿

♫ ♫ CHECK THIS OUT!!! I just found a NEW app that HELPS you discover cool APPS and receive FREE $50,$100, or $500 Gift Cards as REWARDS!!! I made so much i bought a new MACBOOK PRO! Just follow﻿ these 3 easy steps: 1.DOWNLOAD App Trailers from app store or Android Market (store) from iPod,iPhone,iPad,or Android 2.GO to VIDEOS and Then you'll see a star﻿ that says BONUS CODE..click it 3.Then put the CODE:mac411 THEN you'll get started with points to REDEEM for Gift Cards (50 points) ENJOY!!!♫ ♫

you are a fuckin loser, A LOT of people were saying shane is just not funny anymore.﻿ Its called growin up, probably something you havent experienced yet. And i dont know if you noticed but shane was actually at the point of hitting 3 mil. subscribers. he had at least 2,989,000. Until most people grew up and realized he was only entertaining kids. And being an ass kisser and do anything for shane is fucking stupid. Your also clearly a kid cuz you didnt even know what he meant by "ur on his dick"
Yes he﻿ is Lol
